subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: ST. LOUIS, Sept. 19 (AP) — Tony La Russa had little to say Wednesday about speculation he would leave the St. Louis Cardinals after a dozen seasons to manage the Seattle Mariners next season.
snippet: ST. LOUIS, Sept. 19 (AP) — Tony La Russa had little to say Wednesday about speculation he would leave the St. Louis Cardinals after a dozen seasons to manage the Seattle Mariners next season.
